alert.note: Alert for Hodgeman; Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:19PM CDT until July 20 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Ness County in west central Kansas... Hodgeman County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Jetmore, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jetmore and Hanston. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
